label: uncl8101
comment: Code specifying the direction of transport.

values.label: Buyer to seller
values.comment: The transport from the buyer to the seller.

values.label: Seller to buyer
values.comment: The transport from the seller to the buyer.

values.label: Subcontractor to seller
values.comment: The transport from the subcontractor to the seller.

values.label: Seller to drop ship designated location
values.comment: The transport from the seller to the drop ship designated location.

values.label: Seller to freight forwarder
values.comment: The transport from the seller to the freight forwarder.

values.label: Seller to subcontractor
values.comment: The transport from the seller to the subcontractor.

values.label: Mother vessel to lighter
values.comment: Cargo is transferred from the main carriage or mother vessel to a lighter.

values.label: Lighter to mother vessel
values.comment: Cargo is transferred from the lighter vessel to a main carriage or mother vessel.

values.label: Mutually defined
values.comment: A code assigned within a code list to be used on an interim basis and as defined among trading partners until a precise code can be assigned to the code list.
